fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Visit a player each day, they will be notified of your visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will gain a night chat with them for that night.
They may choose to spare you or kill you.
If they choose to kill you, they will gain a permanent stage of defense and deal you an unstoppable attack.
If they choose to spare you, their defense will become invincible for that night alone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of the game, and be spared three times.
